p: Despite removing a large amount of thrombi from the RCA, the antegrade flow was still compromised (TIMI 1). We observed no angiographic improvement after several gentle dilatations with a compliant balloon (Trek 3.0 × 15 mm; Abbott Vascular), bailout implant of DES (Xience Sierra 3.5 × 33 mm; Abbott Vascular) on the mid‐RCA where a more extensive thrombus was present and even after adenosine and nitroprusside intracoronary injection (Figure 3e–h).
